Headline: Red and Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red and Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Armitage. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Armitage.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses are still available to provide service on the Brown Line between Clark/Lake - Southport and on the Red Line between Belmont - Roosevelt

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, and Broadway: due to, parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Diversey, Halsted, Belmont, Broadway and over the regular route, due to parade/festival near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland and Clark: due to, parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Clark and over regular route due to a parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

Headline: Temporary #49 Western Reroute at Western/Division
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted near Western/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Chicago, Damen, North Avenue, Western and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Western/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Grand/Division
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Augusta, Pulaski, Armitage, Kimball due to, street blockage near Grand/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Augusta, Pulaski, Armitage, Kimball, resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Grand/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Allow extra travel time.
